originalText.text: Dr. Sherman hands down is the most professional and gentle dentist. I was able to get the car I needed the same day. I am extremely frightened of extractions, due to a rough extraction of a wisdom tooth. he assured me he would be gentle as possible. Not only was it fast, the pain level was 1/2 of what I had experienced from the previous dentist. And the aftercare appt. was just as pleasant.

originalText.text: Dr Sherman is arguably the best physician I’ve ever encountered. Not only is his demeanor superb, Dr Sherman is extremely thorough and conscientious when it comes to your health. I feel at ease knowing he’s my internist. I’ve been to a host of other physicians out of the Concorde Medical Group network and they all have only wonderful things to say about him. If you need an internist please take my advice and look no further.

text.text: Dr Sherman is arguably the best physician I’ve ever encountered. Not only is his demeanor superb, Dr Sherman is extremely thorough and conscientious when it comes to your health. originalText.text: I’ve been seeing Dr.Sherman for more than 10 years.  As a Foreign Service and Federal Law Officer Officer, I often live and work around the world. However, I always come back and see Dr.Sherman at least once a year, because he cares deeply about my overall health and well being.  I also appreciate that he doesn’t recommend over the counter medicine for everything, and instead encourages me to eat healthier and/or exercise more.  He is always very professional, kind, and responds to my calls when needed. I have no problem recommending him to my friends or family.

originalText.text: Love Dr. Sherman. I’ve been seeing him now as my primary physician for several years and feel very comfortable during my visits. He is very thorough and patient. He makes time for his patients. I love Marci (his assistant) - she is awesome!

text.text: Love Dr. Sherman. I’ve been seeing him now as my primary physician for several years and feel very comfortable during my visits. He is very thorough and patient. He makes time for his patients. I love Marci (his assistant) - she is awesome!

originalText.text: I saw Dr. Sherman about a relatively common medical complaint (concussion symptoms), asking for either a medical opinion or a referral. He offered neither, but charged my insurance company for the visit and also had the gall to encourage me to see him again, despite showing no hint of offering actual medical help! Post appointment, I followed up with him twice with no reply. Nice guy, but if you're looking for real medical assistance, I would go elsewhere.
